The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 28 July is 55,785 (6,456.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 23 July, there were 3,090 new confirmed cases (357.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 July, there were 4,050 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 24% (960 fewer cases).
